Text.Page:
Soldier! Need your help. Cult's raiding our wagons, taking our food. Always when the guard's at its weakest, even when we shift routes. Some trick, eh?

Tastes like betrayal to me.

Supervisor {@LinkCreature:17#201#thresher Rotcarn} leads the raids. He's out in the fields gathering troops for something. Kill him. Pick over the corpse for evidence. Let's end this. Done listening?
Skin me alive! Only trusted officers get these ledgers! Someone stole it, it'd be reported. This was given, not taken. Feels real bitter.
Rotcarn dead yet? No? Done listening, then.
